    • Uses of WatsonService in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.alchemy.v1

      Subclasses of WatsonService in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.alchemy.v1 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlchemyDataNews
      AlchemyData News indexes 250k to 300k English language news and blog articles every day with historical search available for the past 60 days.
      class  AlchemyLanguage
      The Alchemy Language service uses offers 12 text analysis services, each of which uses sophisticated natural language processing techniques to analyze your content and add high-level semantic information.
      class  AlchemyVision
      The Alchemy Vision service uses deep learning innovations to understand a picture’s content and context.

      class  NaturalLanguageClassifier

    • Uses of WatsonService in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.personality_insights.v2

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PersonalityInsights
      The Watson Personality Insights service uses linguistic analytics to extract a spectrum of cognitive and social characteristics from the text data that a person generates through blogs, tweets, forum posts, and more.

    • Uses of WatsonService in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.retrieve_and_rank.v1

      class  RetrieveAndRank
      The IBM Watson Retrieve and Rank service helps users find the most relevant information for their query by using a combination of search and machine learning to find “signals” in the data.

      class  TradeoffAnalytics
      The IBM Watson Tradeoff Analytics service applies decision analytics technology, enabling users to avoid choice overload when making complex decisions involving multiple, conflicting goals.
